org.mitre.taxii.messages

Class TaxiiXmlFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.taxii.messages.TaxiiXmlFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TaxiiXmlFactory, TaxiiXmlFactory

    public abstract class TaxiiXmlFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory for TaxiiXml objects. Each TAXII version has its own factory implementation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TaxiiXmlFactory()
      The constructor automatically adds the Digital Signature JAXB context.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addJaxbContextPackage(java.lang.String packageName)
      Add A JAXB context package to this factory.
      abstract TaxiiXml createTaxiiXml()
      Return an instance of TaxiiXml configured with the JAXB contexts in the context package list.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getContextPackages()
      Returns a live list of context package names.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TaxiiXmlFactory

        public TaxiiXmlFactory()
        The constructor automatically adds the Digital Signature JAXB context.

    • Method Detail

      • addJaxbContextPackage

        public final void addJaxbContextPackage(java.lang.String packageName)
        Add A JAXB context package to this factory. The factory will create a TaxiiXml object that knows how to handle all of the JAXB classes declared in the package. For example, "org.mitre.taxii.query" to handle the TAXII default query classes.
        Parameters:
        packageName -

      • getContextPackages

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getContextPackages()
        Returns a live list of context package names. Changing the returned list will modify the member of the factory.
        Returns:
        list of context package names.

      • createTaxiiXml

        public abstract TaxiiXml createTaxiiXml()
        Return an instance of TaxiiXml configured with the JAXB contexts in the context package list.
        Returns:
